feat\(training\): add adaptive group generation

Implement two-mode character selection strategy:

1. Pattern-based grouping for learning new characters:
   - Groups characters by Morse structure \(single/double/triple/quad elements\)
   - Emphasizes newest character with pattern-similar companions
   - Helps learners recognize rhythmic similarities

2. Accuracy-weighted selection for retention practice:
   - Characters with lower accuracy get higher selection weight
   - Combines historic stats with current session performance
   - Minimum weight ensures mastered characters still appear

Pattern families:
- Single element: E, T
- Double element: I, M, A, N
- Triple element: S, O, U, R, W, G, D, K
- Quad element: H, V, F, L, P, J, B, X, C, Y, Q, Z

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
